# Resources Docs

- [Model Builder Azure Training Resources](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/azure-training-concepts-model-builder.md): A guide of resources for Azure Machine Learning
- [Machine learning glossary](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/glossary.md): A glossary of important machine learning terms that are useful as you build your custom models in ML.NET.
- [How-To: Improve your ML.NET model](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/improve-machine-learning-model-ml-net.md): Learn how to improve your ML.NET model
- [ML.NET metrics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/metrics.md): Understand the metrics that are used to evaluate the performance of an ML.NET model
- [Telemetry collection by ML.NET CLI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/ml-net-cli-telemetry.md): Learn about ML.NET CLI telemetry features that collect usage information for analysis, which data is collected, and how to disable it. Also, find links to the .NET license agreement and information about Microsoft GDPR compliance.
- [Machine learning tasks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/tasks.md): Explore the different machine learning and associated tasks that are supported in ML.NET.
- [Data transformations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/transforms.md): Explore the feature engineering components supported in ML.NET.
